name: Where are me bones?
description:
This is a small game I started making in school for a worldbuilding class and now finished in my free time! It was made with bitsy.org and Bitsy Muse by David Mowatt.

The music and SFX is by my dear friend KoolBoi.

The rest was made by me, with occasional assistance from my dad with the code stuff. I am no drawer or programmer so it's very simple and short because it was a STRUGGLE.

Thank you for taking the time to play it. ^^
